title: David Nicholls: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Bestselling author David Nicholls discusses his latest book. Us tells the story of a family, recounted over the course of what may well be their final weeks together.
itunes:summary: Bestselling author David Nicholls discusses his latest book at the Apple Store, Regent Street in London. Us tells the story of a family, recounted over the course of what may well be their final weeks together. Spanning nine countries and twenty-five years, the story is epic and intimate, funny and heartbreaking.
